verses.roman:
vṛndāvana-dāsa prathama ye līlā varṇila
sei-saba līlāra āmi sūtra-mātra kaila

synonyms: vṛndāvana-dāsa—Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura; prathama—at first; ye—whatever; līlā—pastimes; varṇila—described; sei-saba—all of those; līlāra—of the pastimes; āmi—I; sūtra-mātra kaila—prepared only the synopsis.
translation: Whatever pastimes Śrīla Vṛndāvana dāsa Ṭhākura has first described I have merely summarized.
